Author: TheLittlestPineapple
Text: I went to the cinema with a friend, and he bought me some ice cream. I’d told him countless times that I didn’t want anything, and I just couldn’t bring myself to eat the ice cream. It melted and got all over my jacket. I’m insanely guilty, but deep down I’m aware that it’s part of the disorder. Please don’t blame yourself, you’re not alone in this. Hopefully it gets better for you <3
